entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Usage of `static virtual` method from interface gets miscompiled as infinite loop #110932
  • `JsonSerializerContext` in System.Text.Json doesn't support the same inheritor class name in different namespaces #110931
  • how set trace level in wasmbrowser #110928
  • .net 9 text.json rounds long numbers #110927
  • [API Proposal]: ServiceCollection support post service registration #110926
  • EnumBuilder.UnderlyingSystemType != EnumBuilder.CreateType().UnderlyingSystemType #110924

Closed

  • System.Linq.Parallel.Tests.ParallelQueryCombinationTests.Union_NotPipelined times out #37698
  • Change/Remove ClientWebSocket ping packet body #110158
  • DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString should return identical strings for identical settings #834
    Future
  • Exact column names to be passed in IDataReader #30707
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'HBtab->ebdTryBeg == block' #110756
  • Add Dispose/IDisposable to GCHandle #54792
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: GCHandle.GetTargetUnsafe() with no handle validation #94113
    Future
  • CompareAttribute.IsValid results in null ref #42490
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor use of `FastAllocateString` #110929
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [Safe code] Clean up Guid.TryFormatX #110923
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Use postorder numbers as keys into ordinals in 3-opt layout #110922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Added check of RequiresValidationContext before calling IsValid #110647
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Don't move EH region entries when aligning backward jumps #110918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • Fix alignment padding and add test for saving managed resources #110915
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
